WELCOME TO DREAMWORLD!

  • The creative open world MMO
  • Sculpt the world and create with a massive catalog of objects
  • One single world, millions of players 
  • Explore thousands of unique biomes
  • Fight and tame DreamWorld's incredible creatures

Didn't catch the Kickstarter but interested to see what all the hype is about? Get the DreamWorld Alpha Development Pass!

New content and features like those listed above are being built towards and added to DreamWorld's Alpha nearly every week. Here are a few of the features we've added in the first five weeks :

Week 5

  • Character customization
  • In-game chat
  • Chest system overhaul
  • Switch between First Person view,  Third Person, and more!
  • Avatar replication improvements
  • Alpha access now open on Itch.io! 

Week 4

  • Multiplayer avatars
  • Storage chests to keep your hard-earned resources! 
    • Defend your own, raid others', or trade! 
  • FPS improved by 20%  

Week 3 

  • Hunt for treasure chests across DreamWorld! - loaded with goodies
  • Minimap added - perfect for sharing treasure chest finds
  • City undergoing extensive beautification

Week 2

  • Elysian Spirit Lantern - place to better protect builds in the Wild! (Everything in the Wild outside what you protect will heal back at the end of the week)
  • Explicit rotation improvements - click on the colored axes to try!
  • Load time improvements (lots more to come)
  • Resource cheats fixes 

Week 1

  • A whole new DreamWorld for you to explore and create in
  • The city of Elysium is your new DW community hub
  • Build your dream home on your plot of land in the city 
  • Battle it out with your friends in the arena
  • New functional assets to build and play with - trampoline, launchers, portals, doors
  • Improved inventory experience

You will enjoy your Alpha development pass if you want to be in on the ground floor of an MMO in production. We're listening to our community members' suggestions and putting things they want to see into DreamWorld each week. DreamWorld is not yet a polished or finished game, but if you like bug-hunting, having influence over a game's creation, and experiencing a project progress, this Alpha access is for you! We're a team of 7, a mix of full time and part time. Our aim is to be 8 full time by the end of the year. Come join our Discord to chat with us about feature development!
